Title: Zoom
Overview: Jack Shepard is an out-of-shape auto shop owner, far removed from the man who once protected the world's freedom. Reluctantly called back into action by the government, Jack is tasked with turning a ragtag group of kids with special powers into a new generation of superheroes to save the world from certain destruction.
Tagline: They're going to save the world... as long as they're home for dinner.
Genres: Family, Comedy, Adventure, Action, Science Fiction
Cast: Tim Allen, Courteney Cox, Chevy Chase
